client.enableFacadesInJEI_comment: Show facades in JEI ingredient list
client.enableFacadeRecipesInJEI_comment: Show facade recipes in JEI for supported blocks
client.exposeInventoryToEmi_comment: Expose the full network inventory to EMI, which might cause performance problems.
client.PowerUnit_comment: Power unit shown in AE UIs
client.showPlacementPreview_comment: Show a preview of part and facade placement
client.notifyForFinishedCraftingJobs_comment: Show toast when long-running crafting jobs finish.
client.fancyPatternTooltips_comment: Show fancy tooltips for encoded patterns.
client.clearGridOnClose_comment: Automatically clear the crafting/encoding grid when closing the terminal
client.terminalMargin_comment: The vertical margin to apply when sizing terminals. Used to make room for centered item mod search bars
client.autoPauseTerminal_comment: Pause the terminal exactly like when pressing shift, except done automatically

widgetNumbers._comment: Number button values in the level emitter config panel and the craft order amount picker
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberBase1_comment: Value of the first button when not pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberBase2_comment: Value of the second button when not pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberBase3_comment: Value of the third button when not pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberBase4_comment: Value of the fourth button when not pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberAlt1_comment: Value of the first button when pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberAlt2_comment: Value of the second button when pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberAlt3_comment: Value of the third button when pressing shift or ctrl
widgetNumbers.widgetNumberAlt4_comment: Value of the fourth button when pressing shift or ctrl

terminals.pinAutoCraftedItems_comment: Pin items that the player auto-crafts to the top of the terminal

search.searchModNameInTooltips_comment: Should the mod name be included when searching in tooltips.
search.useExternalSearch_comment: Replaces AEs own search with the search of REI or JEI
search.clearExternalSearchOnOpen_comment: When using useExternalSearch, clears the search when the terminal opens
search.syncWithExternalSearch_comment: When REI/JEI is installed, automatically set the AE or REI/JEI search text when either is changed while the terminal is open
search.rememberLastSearch_comment: Remembers the last search term and restores it when the terminal opens
search.autoFocusSearch_comment: Automatically focuses the search field when the terminal opens

tooltips.showCellUpgrades_comment: Show installed upgrades in the tooltips of storage cells, color applicators and matter cannons
tooltips.showCellContent_comment: Show a preview of the content in the tooltips of storage cells, color applicators and matter cannons
tooltips.maxCellContentShown_comment: The maximum number of content entries to show in the tooltip of storage cells, color applicators and matter cannons
tooltips.enableGuideHotkey_comment: Enables the 'hold key to show guide' functionality in tooltips
